description:
It’s been a week since Yoshiki transferred to Baramon High School. The elegant student council president, Renji Kagami, and the captain of the soccer team, Sakuya Mitsurugi has entered the picture, making the high school life even hotter!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Full of Excitement! Baramon High School
Les cœurs s`emballent au lycée Baramon
ときめきいっぱい! 薔薇門高校
